alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Iowa; Johnson; Muscatine (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 8:14PM CDT until July 28 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Cedar County in east central Iowa... Johnson County in east central Iowa... Northwestern Muscatine County in east central Iowa... Northern Iowa County in east central Iowa... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 813 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Swisher to Conroy, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Iowa City, Tipton, Marengo, West Branch, Coralville, North Liberty, West Liberty, Williamsburg, Solon, Tiffin, Lone Tree, University Heights, Swisher, Oxford, Hills, Shueyville, Ladora, Lake Macbride State Park, Conroy and Rochester. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
